body:
_**wiiclipse**_ is an Eclipse plugin that integrates the [devkitPPC toolchain](http://www.devkitPro.org) into the Eclipse IDE for C/C++ Developers.

### Features

* Works on Linux, Mac and Windows
* Integrates the devkitPPC toolchain into the Eclipse IDE for C/C++ Developers
* Automatically discovers built-in compiler include paths and symbols
* Makes the Eclipse Code Completion feature work out of the box with any C/C++ project that uses the devkitPPC toolchain
* Supports the Eclipse CDT Managed Build System 
* Allows you to run your applications on your Wii from within Eclipse

### Documentation

Information on how to install and to use _**wiiclipse**_ can be found in the [wiiclipse user guide](wiiclipse/wiiclipse#1).

### License

WiiClipse is open source and released under the terms of the [GNU General Public License (GPL)] (https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.html).
